attributes.action: All of the UK should be entitled to vote in the Scottish Referendum.
attributes.background: The Scottish referendum, in which the Scottish people voted to remain or leave the United Kingdom, was held only for Scottish people.  This is a decision which effects not only Scotland, but also England, Wales and Northern Ireland.  Any future referendum should include all of the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/138467
